    ğŸ¤– About Me

    Iâ€™m currently a Postdoctoral Researcher at Wuhan University, China. I obtained my Ph.D. degree at Wuhan University under the joint supervision of Prof. Yongjun Zhang and Prof. Jiayuan Li. Our research teamâ€™s official website is SkyEarth.

    My research focuses on developing robust algorithms for autonomous navigation systems, with primary interests in:

    • Simultaneous Localization and Mapping (SLAM)
    • Precise Localization in Dynamic Environments
    • Point Cloud Registration
    • Loop Closure Detection / Place Recognition
